artist: Painter: After Leonardo da Vinci; Etcher: Antonio Tempesta
description: two images printed as a single image; at left, head and shoulders portrait of a man facing right in profile wearing armor, with a sword over his right shoulder; beak-like nose and long moustache; at right woman facing left in profile, wearing a bodice with high collar and ruff; hair pulled back and up with veil attached; prominent chin and forehead, small nose; enclosed in a frame with birds and scrolls
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Il coraggioso Ruggiero   La bella Bradamante / Antonio Tempesta fecit  |  on sheet in pencil: 2-450
title: Il Coraggioso Ruggerio / La Bella Bradamante
